short_description: DRY CLOTHES FASTER AND SAVE MONEY: The DryerPLUS System dryer ball's unique oblong aerodynamic design opens up spaces in the clothing and circulates air more efficiently to dry clothes quicker. This may reduce drying times, and therefore heat and electricity, by 25% or more. The special nodules on the balls massage the garments to soften the clothes, and also reduce lint and wrinkling. You can even add a few drops of your favorite aromatherapy oil in the top aperture of the balls to add an all natural and non-toxic scent

LESS IRONING, LESS LINT AND LESS WRINKLING WITHOUT CHEMICALS. Less Ironing - you may see a distinct reduction in wrinkles in clothing. Softer Clothes - All-natural fabric softening for your clothing without the need of chemical softeners or dryer sheets. Less Lint - More complete removal of annoying lint balls. Superior drying results because of the Extra Large XL size, oblong aerodynamic shape, unique massaging nodules and proprietary design of these dryerballs.

SAFE AND NON TOXIC FOR YOUR FAMILY'S HEALTH AND THE ENVIRONMENT. Eliminates the toxic chemicals in the drying process, and their deposition on your skin, in your clothing and breathing into your lungs. Perfect for people with allergies, multiple chemical sensitivities, babies, MCS and sensitive skin. Safe for any dryer. Get fantastic results without chemicals that can cause rashes, respiratory problems, allergies and problems with your skin. Safer than chemicals around pets and children.

THEY DON'T HURT SHEEP & THEY DON'T WEAR OUT LIKE WOOL DRYER BALLS. A permanent vegan drying solution that doesn't wear out like the wool dryer balls do, and more humane than harvesting sheep for their wool. A much safer choice for people that suffer from wool or lanolin allergies, live the vegan lifestyle, and who care about the ethical treatment of animals. And you won't have to clean out a wool mess, deal with added lint on your clothes or worry about wool jamming your dryer or causing a fire.

SAVES YOU TIME AND MONEY. Eliminate buying liquid fabric softeners and dryer sheets, and make drying your clothes a breeze! Just leave the dryer balls in your dryer and don't take them out. Set your dryer for 25% shorter cycles and reap the benefits of the time, energy and money savings. Use thousands and thousands of times. Comes with a limited 2-year warranty in USA.
product_description: The Dryer System gives you the natural smell and feel of clothes that were hung outside in fresh air on a clothesline. There are no heavily perfumed chemical smells or slimy chemical residues left behind on your skin. Right away you'll smell and feel a difference. Your clothes will actually feel and smell clothesline fresh--nice and soft. HUGE Savings. A box of chemical dryer sheets currently costs five dollars and up. Liquid fabric softeners and dryer sheets are petrochemical (crude oil) based, and cost even more at $8 to $10 per bottle. Costs continue to rise due to escalating chemical, manufacturing and transportation costs. Many households use several bottles or boxes of fabric softener a month. Even though fabric softeners may seem like a small expense, they are purchased so often that many households spend a small fortune on them annually. It is just another household expense that you do not need, and one you can eliminate with the Dryer System. A reduction of the amount of harsh chemicals on your clothing and the long drying times causes less wear and tear on your expensive clothes and on the dryer. Using the Dryer System may lengthen the life of your costly wardrobe and dryer, and keep more money in your pocket. Also much better and safer than using expensive and temporary wool dryer balls. Wool dryer balls: 1. Last a short period of time and then get thrown out 2. Are much more expensive than the Dryer System 3. Dont have the massaging nodes that are actually what softens your clothing. 4. Can come apart and potential damage/jam your washer and become a fire hazard. 5. Can actually exacerbate wool and lanolin allergies. The Dryer System has none of these major drawbacks, works better, lasts MUCH longer and costs less. Switch from chemical fabric softeners, dryer sheets and wool dryer balls to the Dryer System and see the difference!
